title: The Replacement
description: Brenna Yovanoff's eerily beautiful New York Times bestselling debut, now in paperback!Mackie Doyle is The Replacement—left in the crib of a human baby sixteen years ago. He has been raised among us. But he is not one of us. Now, he must face the dark creatures of the slag heaps from which he came and find his rightful place—in our world or theirs.
author: Brenna Yovanoff
